meanings.sent1: The mosque looked majestic with its minareted towers.
meanings.sent2: The minareted building stood out in the city skyline.
meanings.sent3: The minareted structure seemed to reach for the sky.
meanings.sent4: The minareted silhouette against the sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The minareted architecture added a unique charm to the town.

meanings.definition: To adorn or provide with minarets.
meanings.sent1: The architect minareted the mosque beautifully.
meanings.sent2: They minareted the building to give it an exotic look.
meanings.sent3: The builders minareted the structure with precision and care.
meanings.sent4: She minareted the design with intricate details.
meanings.sent5: The team minareted the tower, making it a landmark in the area.
